news.headline: Xylem Inc. (NYSE: XYL) reported total revenue of $2.3 billion, exceeding guidance, with strong Q4 earnings. Record-breaking year overall.
news.summary: In Washington, Xylem Inc. (NYSE: XYL), a renowned water solutions company committed to addressing global water challenges, disclosed its fourth-quarter and full-year 2024 performance. The company reported total revenue of $2.3 billion, surpassing initial projections due to robust execution and demand. Fourth-quarter earnings also exceeded expectations. Matthew Pine, Xylem’s C, expressed satisfaction, stating, “The team's outstanding performance in Q4 culminated in a remarkable year for Xylem.”

news.headline: Mainstreet Equity Corp. in Q1 2025 achieved 13th consecutive quarter of double-digit growth with FFO up by 19%, NOI up by 18%, and rental revenues up by 16%. Operating margins increased to 64.7%.
news.summary: In the first quarter of 2025, Mainstreet achieved its 13th consecutive quarter of impressive growth with double-digit year-over-year increases in key operating metrics. Despite the usual slowdown in winter rentals during Q1, the company saw a 19% rise in funds from operations (FFO), an 18% increase in net operating income (NOI), and a 16% growth in rental revenues. Same-asset NOI experienced an 11% uptick, while revenues on a same-asset basis grew by 10%. Operating margins improved from 63.5% to 64.7%, and on a same-asset basis from 63.7% to 64.7%.

news.headline: Affiliated Advisors introduces "Synthesis" Advisor Program to support next-gen advisors in building their practices.
news.summary: Affiliated Advisors unveiled the "Synthesis" Advisor Program in New York on Feb 4, 2025. The program aims to equip future advisors to establish successful practices using three distinct support models. This initiative by the renowned advisor service and support platform signifies a shift towards empowering aspiring advisors.

news.headline: AMETEK reports record Q4 sales of $1.76 billion, up by 2% from Q4 2023. Operating income strong.
news.summary: On February 4, 2025, AMETEK, Inc. shared its financial performance for the quarter ending December 31, 2024. The company reported record sales of $1.76 billion for Q4 2024, marking a 2% rise from the same period in 2023. Operating income was not disclosed in the provided snippet.

news.headline: AMETEK Inc. (NYSE: AME) acquires Kern Microtechnik, a leader in high-precision machining and optical inspection.
news.summary: On February 4, 2025, AMETEK, Inc. revealed the purchase of Kern Microtechnik, a prominent company known for producing high-precision machining and optical inspection solutions. The acquisition signifies AMETEK's strategic move to enhance its portfolio in the ultra-precision manufacturing sector. Kern Microtechnik's expertise in this field will complement AMETEK's existing capabilities and strengthen its position in the market. AMETEK's stock trades on the NYSE under the ticker symbol AME, and this acquisition demonstrates the company's commitment to growth and innovation.

news.headline: Satellite Propulsion Market to reach $5.19 billion by 2030, with CAGR of 12.2% from $2.60 billion in 2024.
news.summary: Based on a recent report by MarketsandMarkets™, the Satellite Propulsion market is projected to grow significantly from USD 2.60 billion in 2024 to USD 5.19 billion by 2030, representing a Compound Annual Growth Rate (CAGR) of 12.2%. The increase in market size is driven by various factors...

news.headline: Global machine translation market expected to grow by USD 1.23 billion from 2024-2028, with 15.89% CAGR, boosted by demand for content localization.
news.summary: A recent report highlights the impact of artificial intelligence on the market industry. The global machine translation market is projected to increase by an estimated USD 1.23 billion between 2024 and 2028, with a forecasted compound annual growth rate (CAGR) of 15.89%. This data comes from Technavio, showing the significant growth and transformation driven by AI.

news.headline: Pentair reports $973M sales in Q4 2024, down 1% YoY. EPS at $0.99, adjusted EPS at $1.08.
news.summary: Pentair plc revealed a total sales figure of $973 million for the fourth quarter of 2024, indicating a 1% decrease from the previous year's sales in the same period. Excluding factors such as currency fluctuations, acquisitions, and divestitures, the core sales also saw a 1% decline during the fourth quarter. Earnings per diluted share from continuing operations ("EPS") were $0.99 in Q4 2024, down from $1.25 in Q4 2023. Adjusted EPS stood at $1.08 for the company during this quarter.

news.headline: Energizer Holdings, Inc. reports Q1 2025 growth: Net sales up 2.1%, organic sales up 3.8%, EPS $0.30. Gross margin 36.8% (40.0% adjusted).
news.summary: The company reported a 2.1% increase in net sales for the quarter, with organic net sales growing by 3.8%. Both Battery and Auto Care segments saw organic sales growth. The gross margin for the first quarter stood at 36.8%, while the adjusted gross margin was 40.0%, marking a 50 basis points improvement compared to the previous year's adjusted gross margin. Earnings per share for the period amounted to $0.30.

news.headline: Protalix BioTherapeutics to present at 2025 BIO CEO & Investor Conference on Feb. 11, 2025 at 10:15 AM EST. (NYSE American: PLX)
news.summary: On Tuesday, February 11, 2025 at 10:15 AM Eastern Standard Time, a corporate presentation will be held in CARMIEL, Israel. Protalix BioTherapeutics, Inc., a biopharmaceutical company concentrating on recombinant products, will make this presentation. The company is listed on the NYSE American under the ticker symbol PLX.

news.headline: Piedmont Lithium ships 55,700 dmt of spodumene concentrate in Q4’24 from North America's largest mine joint venture.
news.summary: Piedmont Lithium Inc., a key North American supplier of lithium products crucial for the U.S. electric vehicle industry, revealed it sent out about 55,700 dry metric tons of spodumene concentrate in the fourth quarter of 2024. The North America Lithium (NAL) mine, the region's top spodumene producer, is a collaboration between Piedmont (25%) and Sayona Mining Limited (75%). This operational result was for Q4’24.

news.headline: Australia bans Deepseek from government tech on security concern - Sources
Coinbase faces allegations of security negligence, causing users to lose over $300M yearly, claim crypto investigators.
news.summary: ZachXBT and tanuki42, crypto investigators, state that Coinbase failed to address security flaws leading to losses exceeding $300 million per year for its users.

news.headline: Vista Gold's 2024 drilling at Mt Todd shows potential to increase gold reserves at Batman deposit in 400m strike length. Feasibility study to follow.
news.summary: Vista Gold Corp recently reported that its 2024 Mt Todd drilling program has shown promising results, with the potential to expand gold mineral reserves at the Batman deposit. The program also successfully identified the South Cross Lode (“SXL”) along a 400-meter strike length. These findings, alongside data from the 2020-2022 drilling initiatives, will be incorporated into the block model for the revised Mt Todd mineral resources assessment and upcoming feasibility study. The efforts mark Phase 1 of the project. The company trades on NYSE American and TSX under the ticker symbol VGZ.

news.headline: Report on World Oil Refining Industry 2025 projects market trends and challenges up to 2030, with key players like ExxonMobil, TotalEnergies, and more - ResearchAndMarkets.com.
news.summary: In Dublin, a report titled "World Oil Refining Industry 2025 - Oil Refining Market Trends, Challenges and Outlook to 2030" has been included in ResearchAndMarkets.com's offerings. This comprehensive report delves into the global crude oil refining industry, presenting detailed data on existing and upcoming (new build) refineries at a country level. It offers valuable insights and projections regarding refinery capacities, complexity factors, and peer group comparisons. This report serves as a vital resource for industry stakeholders looking to understand the landscape of the oil refining market.

news.headline: Merck reports strong Q4 earnings, but soft guidance disappoints investors.
Jacobs reports strong Q1 results with an 18.9% backlog growth, $202M in share repurchases, and $1.5B share repurchase program. Dividend up 10% to $0.32/share.
news.summary: In the past year, the backlog has increased by 18.9%. The company's trailing twelve months book-to-bill ratio stands at 1.3x. In the first quarter, $202 million worth of shares were repurchased. Additionally, the board has approved a $1.5 billion share repurchase program - the largest in the company's history. The dividend has been raised to $0.32 per share, reflecting a 10% increase year-over-year. Furthermore, the company plans to increase its FY 2025 earnings.

news.headline: AAFPRS released new statistics on facial plastic surgery trends. Includes Ozempic Face, facelifts, fat grafting, male procedures, and regenerative medicine.
news.summary: The American Academy of Facial Plastic and Reconstructive Surgery (AAFPRS) recently held a conference in Washington on Feb. 4, 2025, showcasing a variety of procedures in the field. Attendees explored a range of treatments, from the innovative 'Ozempic Face' technique to traditional facelifts, fat grafting, male-specific procedures, and advancements in regenerative medicine. This event, organized by the largest association of facial plastic and reconstructive surgeons globally, presented the latest trends and techniques in the industry, with a focus on cutting-edge practices and technologies. Overall, the conference highlighted the diversity and evolution of facial procedures in today's medical landscape.

news.headline: $PFE Pfizer Q4 2024 Earnings
US stocks to open lower due to ongoing trade war. Futures down: Nasdaq 100 -0.10%, S&P 500 -0.20%, Dow Jones -0.24%. Tariffs impact market.
news.summary: U.S. stock futures dropped on Tuesday due to concerns over new tariffs by the administration. Mexico and Canada negotiated deals to delay tariffs. Major index futures were down, with notable companies like Google, AMD, Pfizer, PepsiCo, and Spotify set to report earnings. The 10-year Treasury yield was at 4.58% and the two-year at 4.25%. Futures for Nasdaq 100, S&P 500, Dow Jones, and Russell 2000 were all in the negative. SPY fell 0.17%, while QQQ was up 0.01% in premarket trading. Monday saw the Dow plummet over 665 points due to tariff announcements. Owens & Minor shares fell 35%, but Tyson Foods reported strong earnings. December's construction spending rose by 0.5%, and January's ISM manufacturing PMI was at 50.9. Most S&P 500 sectors declined apart from utilities and consumer staples amid a mix of gains and losses. The Nasdaq Composite dropped 1.20%, S&P 500 by 0.76%, Dow Jones by 0.28%, and Russell 2000 by 1.28%. Find more details on Benzinga.com.

news.headline: Jacobs approves $1.5 billion share repurchase, largest in history. 2025 program to buy back shares on the market.
news.summary: The largest share repurchase program in the history of the company has been announced by Jacobs (NYSE: J) on February 4, 2025. The company's Board of Directors has approved the new program, named the 2025 Share Repurchase Program, which allows for an incremental share repurchase authorization. This program permits the purchase of a significant number of shares, marking a milestone for the company's financial strategies.

news.headline: ONEOK and MPLX to build 400,000-barrel per day LPG export terminal on U.S. Gulf Coast, expanding NGL value chain.
news.summary: TULSA, Okla. - On Feb. 4, 2025, ONEOK, Inc. and MPLX LP announced their collaboration to expand and extend the integrated NGL value chain. They have signed definitive agreements to establish joint ventures aiming to build a significant new facility with a capacity of 400,000 barrels per day (bpd) for liquefied petroleum gas. This initiative signifies a strategic move in enhancing their operations and ensuring a more comprehensive NGL processing and distribution network for their consumers.

news.headline: Apollo secures new private wealth record; credit attracts clients.报道
Modiv Industrial to reveal Q4 2024 results on March 4, 2025. Conference call at 11:00 a.m. Eastern Time. Dial 1-877-407-0789.
news.summary: Denver-based Modiv Industrial, Inc. (NYSE: MDV), a leading public REIT specializing in industrial manufacturing real estate acquisitions, is set to release its financial results for the quarter and year concluding on December 31, 2024. The report will be made available before the market opens on Tuesday, March 4, 2025. A conference call will be conducted by management on the same day at 11:00 a.m. Eastern Time to analyze the outcomes. To participate in the live conference call, dial 1-877-407-0789 or 1-201-689-85.

news.headline: MPLX LP announces $4.3 billion net income and $6.8 billion adjusted EBITDA for 2024, up 10% and 8% from the previous year.
news.summary: A new fractionation complex and export terminal has been announced in Findlay, Ohio, as part of the Gulf Coast NGL strategy. In the year 2024, net income attributable to MPLX reached $4.3 billion, showing a 10% increase from the previous year, while adjusted EBITDA stood at $6.8 billion, marking an 8% increase year over year.

news.headline: Willis Towers Watson shifts focus to mergers and acquisitions after meeting profit goals.
Matrix Executions improves US listed options suite for better price discovery and liquidity with new enhancements.
news.summary: Chicago-based company has announced significant improvements in electronic U.S. listed options functionality aimed at facilitating price and liquidity discovery. The enhancements are designed to streamline the process and improve trading efficiency. The updates are expected to benefit a wide range of users by providing increased accessibility and convenience in options trading.

news.headline: Global functional food ingredients market to grow by USD 53.14 billion from 2024-2028 at a CAGR of 7.38%. Probiotic demand boosts market. AI driving transformation - Technavio.
news.summary: A recent report analyzing the impact of AI on market trends indicates that the global functional food ingredients market is projected to increase in size by approximately USD 53.14 billion between 2024 and 2028. The study conducted by Technavio forecasts a compound annual growth rate (CAGR) of nearly 7.38% for the market during this period.

news.headline: Arizona Sonoran highlighted progress at Cactus Project in 2024, with a fully-funded work plan for 2025.
news.summary: A company headquartered in Toronto and Casa Grande, Arizona, known as ASCU, has recently reported on the notable advancements achieved at the Cactus Project in the year 2024. They have also disclosed their comprehensive financial backing for the strategic objectives set for 2025.

news.headline: Strong financial results in 2024 with all 2024 targets exceeded by Ferrari. CEO anticipates further growth in 2025.
news.summary: Benedetto Vigna, the CEO of Ferrari, attributed the exceptional financial performance in 2024 to prioritizing quality of revenues over volumes, driven by a strong product mix and increasing demand for personalizations. The company anticipates continued robust growth in 2025, which is expected to exceed profitability targets for 2026. Vigna credited the success to teamwork across all areas of the company, as demonstrated in a competitive racing season. Innovation was highlighted through the introduction of the e-building, launch of the Ferrari F80 supercar, and establishment of the E-Cells Lab for electrochemical advancements. Further plans for the company's future will be unveiled at the upcoming Capital Markets Day on 9th October.

news.headline: Extu's CMO Nichole Gunn named one of Georgia's top 100 business leaders by Titan CEO. Honored for leadership beyond workplace.
news.summary: Nichole Gunn, Chief Marketing Officer of Extu, has been included in the prestigious Titan 100 list for 2025 by Titan CEO, recognizing top CEOs and C-level executives in Georgia. The announcement was made in Atlanta on February 4, 2025. Gunn expressed her aim to extend her leadership beyond the boundaries of her professional environment, emphasizing a broader impact beyond the workplace.

news.headline: Global cyclopentadiene market reached US$ 845.0 million in 2024, expected to grow at 5.7% CAGR, reaching US$ 1,471.0 million by 2034. North America estimated to hold a 27.3% market share in 2034.
news.summary: The global cyclopentadiene market was valued at US$ 845.0 million in 2024 and is projected to grow at a CAGR of 5.7% to reach US$ 1,471.0 million by 2034. This represents an absolute $ opportunity of US$ 626.0 million between 2024 to 2034. North America is anticipated to hold a market share of 27.3% in 2034, with North America and East Asia collectively expected to create an absolute $ opportunity of US$ 366.5 million. Cyclopentadiene is an organic compound which dimerizes to give dicyclopentadiene via Diels-Alder reaction, and it can be obtained from naphtha cracked in the steam and by distillation from coal tar. The report emphasizes historical and current applications of cyclopentadiene click reactions, focusing on reactivities and stabilities of cyclopentadiene and its derivatives. This information was provided by Fact.MR, a market research and competitive intelligence provider.

news.headline: Aramark (ARMK) reports Q1 fiscal 2025 results, highlighting commitment to strategic priorities.
news.summary: In Philadelphia, Aramark (NYSE: ARMK) released their first quarter results for fiscal 2025. The company expressed satisfaction with their performance, highlighting a focus on strategic priorities. These priorities include boosting profitable revenue growth from existing and new sources, enhancing operational income through higher volume and supply chain efficiencies, and taking advantage of their capital structure. Notable recent actions include successfully refinancing debt and buying back Aramark shares.

news.headline: Trump's tariffs exceed expectations, causing significant impact on economy.
Westwater Resources praises recent Executive Orders highlighting critical minerals like battery-grade graphite.
news.summary: Westwater Resources, Inc., a company specializing in energy technology and battery-grade natural graphite, has expressed support for the Executive Orders from the White House highlighting critical minerals, including battery-grade graphite. The company, traded as WWR on the NYSE American, praised the emphasis on these minerals in light of a recent Executive Order issued on January 20, 2025, by President Trump declaring a national energy emergency. The Order urges federal agencies to leverage their authorities in addressing the need for such minerals.

news.headline: Dolphin Semiconductor appoints Robert LeFort as Chairman and Shelly Van Dyke as independent Board member.
news.summary: Dolphin Semiconductor, based in Meylan, France, and Montreal, Canada, has recently appointed Robert LeFort as the Chairman of the Board. Additionally, Shelly Van Dyke has joined the Board as an independent member. This move aims to strengthen the company's leadership and governance.

news.headline: B2Gold's PEA results for Antelope Deposit at Otjikoto Mine in Namibia show $131M NPV and 35% IRR.
news.summary: B2Gold Corp. released promising preliminary data of a positive Preliminary Economic Assessment (PEA) following National Instrument 43-101 guidelines for the Antelope deposit within the Otjikoto gold mine in Namibia. The deposit, including the Springbok Zone, Oryx Zone, and potentially a third zone named Impala pending further drilling confirmation, is situated around 4 kilometers southwest of the current open pit. The report did not disclose the financial figures in a different currency than the United States dollar. The company's stock symbols are TSX: BTO, NYSE AMERICAN: BTG, and NSX: B2G as of February 4, 2025, in Vancouver, British Columbia.

news.headline: Marathon Petroleum Corp. reports Q4 2024 net income of $371 million ($1.15/share) and adjusted net income of $249 million ($0.77/share).
news.summary: In Findlay, Ohio, on February 4, 2025, MPC reported a fourth-quarter net income of $371 million attributable to the company, equivalent to $1.15 per diluted share. The adjusted net income for the same period was $249 million, amounting to $0.77 per adjusted diluted share. This financial performance highlights the company's solid progress in advancing its Midstream Gulf Coast NGL strategy. Additionally, MPLX made an announcement in relation to this strategy.

news.headline: Graphic Packaging reported positive results in 2024, achieving an adjusted EBITDA margin of 19.1% and $205 million in Innovation Sales Growth.
news.summary: Key achievements for the full year 2024 include the launch of Vision 2030 and the delivery of an adjusted EBITDA margin of 19.1%. The company saw a return to positive packaging volume growth in the latter half of the year. Innovation sales growth reached $205 million. Additionally, a Virtual Power Purchase Agreement was executed to boost renewable energy use.

news.headline: Akamai earns multiple prestigious awards for ethical leadership and sustainability, including JUST 100 Rankings, Dow Jones Sustainability Index for 11 years, and FTSE4Good for 10 years.
news.summary: Akamai Technologies, a cybersecurity and cloud computing company based in Cambridge, Massachusetts, was recently acknowledged for its dedication to ethical leadership, sustainability, and creating long-term stakeholder value. This recognition demonstrates the company's commitment to these core values. The acknowledgments were received on February 4, 2025, and highlights Akamai's strong corporate ethos and strategic priorities. Akamai, listed on the NASDAQ exchange under the ticker symbol AKAM, is a key player in powering and safeguarding businesses in the online sphere. The company's consistent efforts towards ethical practices and sustainable operations showcase its focus on creating enduring value for stakeholders.

news.headline: CGI's AI solution awarded for digital transformation. Stock symbols: GIB.A (TSX) GIB (NYSE). Bangalore, India. Feb 4, 2025.
news.summary: CGI, a leading global IT and business consulting services firm, has secured a prestigious award from the ACCA (Association of Chartered Certified Accountants). The company's stock market symbols are GIB.A on the TSX and GIB on the NYSE. Headquartered in Bangalore, India, CGI boasts a strong global presence. The news was announced on February 4, 2025.

news.headline: Immunic Inc. (Nasdaq: IMUX) to attend investor and scientific conferences in February 2025.
news.summary: On February 4, 2025, Immunic, Inc. (Nasdaq: IMUX), a biotech firm specializing in oral small molecule therapies for chronic inflammatory and autoimmune conditions, disclosed its involvement in various investor activities.

news.headline: VIAVI introduces XEdge, first all-in-one monitoring solution for edge networks, amid rising wireless tech reliance.
news.summary: In Chandler, Arizona on February 4, 2025, VIAVI Solutions Inc. unveiled XEdge, the first all-in-one solution for continuous edge network testing. This launch comes as wireless technologies are becoming more vital for public, private, and critical networks. VIAVI (NASDAQ: VIAV) is at the forefront of this innovation, addressing the growing reliance on wireless connectivity at the edge.

news.headline: OEM Insulation Market to reach $24.80 billion by 2030, per new report. Minerals wool, PU foam major materials.
news.summary: In Delray Beach, Florida, as of February 4, 2025, a recent report discusses the OEM Insulation Market, focusing on various material types such as Mineral Wool, PU Foam, Flexible Elastomeric Foam, and other materials. The report covers insulation types including Thermal and Acoustic insulation, end-use sectors like Industrial and Commercial, Transportation, and Consumer applications, as well as regions. This comprehensive analysis delves into the market trends and forecasts related to OEM insulation, highlighting key data points and insights for stakeholders.

news.headline: Xenia Hotels & Resorts marks 10 years on NYSE by ringing Closing Bell today at 4:00 PM EST.
news.summary: Celebrating their 10th anniversary on the New York Stock Exchange, Xenia Hotels & Resorts, Inc. will ring The Closing Bell today at 4:00 PM EST. The company (NYSE: XHR) will mark this milestone by participating in the event. This signifies a decade of success since their listing, highlighting their growth and achievements in the financial market. The ceremony taking place in New York honors the journey and progress made by Xenia over the years.

news.headline: CNH Industrial N.V. reports a 28% decline in Q4 revenues and 20% decline in full year revenues due to lower demand.
news.summary: Consolidated revenues dropped by 28% in the fourth quarter and by 20% for the full year due to decreased demand in the Agriculture and Construction equipment industries.

news.headline: Apollo Global Management, Inc. (NYSE: APO) reports Q4 and full year 2024 results on Feb 4, 2025.
news.summary: On February 4, 2025, Apollo Global Management, Inc. (NYSE: APO) released its financial results for the fourth quarter and full year ending on December 31, 2024. The report covers the company's performance during this period.

news.headline: Comstock Fuels gets $152 million allocation for private activity bonds in Oklahoma.
news.summary: Comstock Inc. (NYSE: LODE) shared that its subsidiary, Comstock Fuels Corporation, has gained approval from the Oklahoma State Treasurer’s Office to release a maximum of $152 million in qualified private activity bonds. This update was reported on February 4, 2025, in Oklahoma City.

news.headline: Regeneron announces Q4 and full-year 2024 financial results, starts dividend, ups buyback capacity to $4.5B.
news.summary: Regeneron Pharmaceuticals, Inc., based in Tarrytown, N.Y., revealed their financial outcomes for the fourth quarter and entirety of 2024 on Feb. 4, 2025. The company, listed under NASDAQ as REGN, shared their business progress alongside the numbers.

news.headline: New Taiko Takeoff program to boost blockchain projects with marketing, funding, and tech support, aiding in community growth.
news.summary: Taiko has launched the Taiko Takeoff initiative, aimed at providing assistance to budding blockchain ventures with marketing, financial aid, and technical guidance. The program is structured to cultivate a vibrant community and aid new projects in their growth.
